## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e71b8ecbb1a24ad2e952dddfe831edc984a60be61de846d61903baae55b376bc)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@angular_devkit/core' @ 99.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
